title: Installing the Japanese Server with the OCE server aswell
body: So i was wondering if i could install the Japanese server alongside the OCE one

replies.body: As Rineyy mentioned, you can toggle between different regions through the patcher on the top right.  While you may have accounts on different regions, keep in mind that they have have their own[ supported languages](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  We aren't able to support modification of files in order to change language to an unsupported region.  Please let me know if you have any questions!
Welcomed, have a splash on the Fields of Justice! :)
Not exactly but you can switch the regions to the top right of the patcher and it'll automatically update the selected region's files.
